description.p: Preserve life and light in the world.
When you choose this oath at 3rd level, you gain the following features.

Magic Action; Channel Divinity. You conjure spectral vines. Each creature of your choice that you can see within 15 feet of yourself must succeed on a Strength saving throw or gain the Restrained condition for 1 minute. A restrained creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

sheet.description: Each chosen creature within 15 ft makes shall pass a STR Saving Throw (DC {{paladin:spellcasting:dc}}) or suffer the Restrained condition for 1 minute; repeats save at end of each turn.

description.p: The magic of your oath ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Paladin level specified in the Oath of the Ancients Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.
Ancient magic forms an eldritch ward; you and your allies have Resistance to Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant damage while in your Aura of Protection.

sheet.description: Within your Aura of Protection: you and allies have Resistance to Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant damage.

description.p: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points and not killed outright, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead, and you regain Hit Points equal to three times your Paladin level. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest. In addition, you can't be aged magically, and you cease visibly aging.

sheet.description: When reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, drop to 1 HP and regain {{undying sentinel}} HP. Moreover you are immune to magical aging and cease visible aging.

description.p: Bonus Action. You imbue your Aura of Protection with primal power for 1 minute or until you end the effect (no action required). Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest; you can also restore a use by expending a 5th-level spell slot (no action required).

ul.li: Diminish Defiance. Enemies in the aura have Disadvantage on saving throws against your spells and Channel Divinity options.
Regeneration. At the start of each of your turns, you regain 10 Hit Points.
Swift Spells. When you cast a spell with a casting time of an action, you can cast it using a Bonus Action instead.

sheet.description: For 1 minute your Aura gains the following benefits: enemies has Disadvantage on saves vs your spells and Channel Divinity. You regain 10 HP at start of each turn. Your spells with Action casting time can be cast as a Bonus Action. You can also restore one use by expending a 5th-level spell slot.
